testcase.classname: As a provider, I want to be able to delete blog information with the specified id number via API connection.
testcase.name: Verify that the deleted blog is successfully removed via API by sending a GET request to /api/blog/{id}
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "provider" token............passed * The api user sets "api/blog/93" path parameters...........................passed * The api user sends a GET request and saves the returned response..........passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 203.........................passed
